executive_summary: The Core School maintains a stable sentiment with occasional spikes in mentions. Opportunities exist in expanding program offerings and collaborations, while risks include high competition in Madrid.
key_findings: The Core School's sentiment remains stable with occasional positive spikes, indicating a generally favorable perception.
The Core School holds a competitive share of voice in the market, but faces strong competition from CES and ECAM.
The perception of The Core School is positive, with opportunities to enhance its reputation through program expansion.

opportunities.opportunity: Expandir la oferta de programas en escritura de guiones y producción audiovisual práctica.
Expandir colaboraciones con empresas del sector audiovisual para mejorar la inserción laboral de los estudiantes.

recommendations: Desarrollar y promocionar nuevos programas en áreas de alta demanda.
Fortalecer alianzas con empresas del sector para mejorar la empleabilidad de los graduados.
Implementar estrategias de marketing para destacar frente a la competencia en Madrid.
